channel.title: A little update in this gude needed
channel.description:
So i was following the monero guide for CLI https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Monero
I think that this step #### Creating a desktop shortcut
1. Click on the hamburger menu in the top left corner of the screen -> Configure Desktop
* Move Tor Browser out of the way if you're not able to see it
2. Under 'Wallpaper' change 'Layout' to 'Folder View', then click Apply
* Icons should now appear on the desktop
Was writen for older version of whonix because I cant see a hamburger menu in the left corner of the screen or anywhere else.

item.title: A little update in this gude needed
item.dc:creator: needanswers
item.description:
So i was following the monero guide for CLI

Whonix

Monero

How to use Monero in Whonix

I think that this step

Creating a desktop shortcut

  1. Click on the hamburger menu in the top left corner of the screen -> Configure Desktop
  • Move Tor Browser out of the way if you’re not able to see it
  1. Under ‘Wallpaper’ change ‘Layout’ to ‘Folder View’, then click Apply
  • Icons should now appear on the desktop

Was writen for older version of whonix because I cant see a hamburger menu in the left corner of the screen or anywhere else.

Read full topic
item.source: A little update in this gude needed
